lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Watanabe has acted as mediator between two rival groups, one of which included C and W, seeking to compete against <Kokusai Denshin Denwa Co Ltd>, which now monopolizes Japan's overseas telephone business.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: However, the plan, unveiled by senior Federation of Economic Organizations official Fumio Watanabe, does not specify what stake Cable and Wireless would have.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The proposed merger has sparked an international row, with British government sources threatening retaliatory action against Japan for what they see as discriminatory practices against foreign firms.
